mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
update tbl_reply set replyBoomUp = replyBoomUp + 1 where rno = #{rno}
update tbl_reply set replyBoomDown = replyBoomDown + 1 where rno = #{rno}
